oai_dc:dc.dc:title: WCBC-FM Radio
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Radio stations
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: WCBC-FM was a radio station operated by CBC students and faculty from 1966-1969. It had been preceded by WCBC-AM, which broadcast from Maurelian Hall, only operating within the college's own electrical system. In 1965, Henry Slavick of WMC offered CBC a radio transmitter, a donation that was finalized the following year. The FCC approved WCBC-FM on September 13, 1966.

For all requests, please contact the Archives at archives@cbu.edu.
